          <title>
            <string language="en">chains, paper clips, daisies, plastics, molecules, polymers</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ketten, Papierklammern, Gänseblümchen, Plastik,
Moleküle, Polymer-Plastiken</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">chaînes, trombones, marguerites, plastiques, 
molécules, polymères</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">correntes, grampos de papel, daisies, plásticos,
moléculas, polímeros</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">catene, clip di carta, margherite, plastica, 
molecole, polimeri</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αλυσίδες, συνδετήρες εγγράφου, μαργαρίτες, πλαστικά, 
μόρια, πολυμερή σώματα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">encadenamientos, clips de papel, margaritas, 
plásticos, moléculas, polímeros</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that poly(propene) is formed when lots of small propene molecules join together.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Atoms</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">polymers</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">propene</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß poly(propene) 
gebildet wird, wenn Lots kleine Propenmoleküle zusammen verbinden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration prouve que le poly(propene) est
formé quand un bon nombre de petites molécules de propène se 
joignent ensemble.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que o poly(propene) 
está dado forma quando os lotes de moléculas pequenas do propene 
juntam junto.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica che il poly(propene) 
è formato quando i lotti di piccole molecole del propene si uniscono 
insieme.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι πολυ (propene) 
διαμορφώνεται όταν ενώνουν από κοινού τα μέρη των μικρών 
propene μορίων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que el poly(propene) 
está formado cuando las porciones de moléculas pequeñas del propano
ensamblan juntas.</string>
          </description>
